titles.title: Save Rural Hospitals Act of 2023
Save Rural Hospitals Act of 2023
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure fairness in Medicare hospital payments by establishing a floor for the area wage index applied with respect to certain hospitals.

bill.summary:
Save Rural Hospitals Act of 2023
This bill establishes an area wage adjustment floor for Medicare hospital payments in states that are not frontier states. The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services must establish a maximum rate to preserve budget neutrality.
